result.title: Lead iOS developer/Head of software engineering
result.description:
Lumos is working on sleep technology used by the military (Bluetooth-connected devices, iOS). We are looking for a Lead software engineer/Head of software engineering/CTO to take charge of mobile app development for a project with the Department of Defense.

The position comes with full decision-making power to build on the existing POC product or start fresh, and potentially expand the team in the long run. 

Ideal candidate:

•	Open to start by the end of the year

•	5+ years of engineering experience with iOS development (hands-on)

•	Enjoys autonomy and taking ownership of the product

•	Have experience shipping mobile products, particularly ones that work with BLE devices

•	Architected and built systems related to mobile and web/databases

•	Built and manage engineering team of 1-15. including hiring/managing teams internal, external vendors
result.notes: US citizenship or permanent residence required.
